<h1>一、IndexTTS介绍</h1>
<p>IndexTTS&nbsp;是一种主要基于&nbsp;<a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-b7erz1" href="https://zhida.zhihu.com/search?content_id=258114966&amp;content_type=Article&amp;match_order=1&amp;q=XTTS&amp;zhida_source=entity" target="_blank" data-za-not-track-link="true" data-paste-text="true" rel="noopener nofollow">XTTS</a>&nbsp;和&nbsp;<a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-b7erz1" href="https://zhida.zhihu.com/search?content_id=258114966&amp;content_type=Article&amp;match_order=1&amp;q=Tortoise&amp;zhida_source=entity" target="_blank" data-za-not-track-link="true" data-paste-text="true" rel="noopener nofollow">Tortoise</a>&nbsp;的&nbsp;GPT 风格的文本转语音 （TTS）&nbsp;模型。它能够使用拼音纠正汉字的发音，并通过标点符号控制任何位置的停顿。我们增强了系统的多个模块，包括扬声器条件特征表示的改进，以及集成&nbsp;BigVGAN2&nbsp;以优化音频质量。经过数万小时的数据训练，我们的系统实现了最先进的性能，优于当前流行的 TTS 系统，如 XTTS、CosyVoice2、Fish-Speech 和 F5-TTS。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202508/1341090-20250815171546601-1245720031.png" alt="IndexTTS" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>最近IndexTTS发布了最新的TTS-1.5模型，显著的提高了模型的稳定性和在英语语言中的性能表现。IndexTTS-1.5的语音克隆更加真实，语音克隆质量更高了。</p>
<p>项目主页：<a href="https://index-tts.github.io/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://index-tts.github.io/</a></p>
<p>GitHub：<a href="https://github.com/index-tts/index-tts" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/index-tts/index-tts</a></p>
<h2>硬件要求</h2>
<p>操作系统：Windows 10/11 64 位，或 Ubuntu 22.04+<br>CPU：四核<br>内存：16 GB 及以上<br>显卡：最低 4 GB 显存即可启动</p>

<h1>二、安装Index-TTS</h1>
<h2>环境说明</h2>
<p>操作系统：windows 11家庭版</p>
<p>python版本：3.13.2</p>
<p>Anaconda：2025.06-0</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>硬件我已经满足最低需求，注意显卡必须要达到要求。</p>
<h2>Microsoft C++ 生成工具</h2>
<p>打开链接：https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/zh-hans/visual-cpp-build-tools/</p>
<p>下载生成工具</p>
<p>勾选C++组件</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202508/1341090-20250815175649235-1934695990.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;勾选linux c++组件</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202508/1341090-20250815175711941-1213899730.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;然后点击安装，等待20分钟左右安装完成。</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>注意，这个必须要安装，否则安装pynini会报错。</strong></span></p>
<h2>环境设置</h2>
<h2>1.下载仓库代码</h2>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>git clone https:<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">github.com/index-tts/index-tts.git</span></pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>2.安装依赖项</h2>
<p>创建一个新的conda环境并安装依赖项：</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>conda create --prefix D:\<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">file</span>\conda\envs\index-tts python=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">3.13</span>.<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
conda activate D:\</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">file</span>\conda\envs\index-tts</pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>安装PyTorch，提供CUDA指令集架构，用来驱动英伟达显卡。</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>pip3 <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">install</span> torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https:<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">download.pytorch.org/whl/cu128</span></pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>为了避免windows安装pynini遇到错误，通过conda安装pynini</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>conda <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">install</span> -c conda-forge pynini==<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2.1</span>.<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">6</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
pip </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">install</span> WeTextProcessing --no-deps</pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>安装IndexTTS依赖软件包</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>cd index-<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">tts
pip </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">install</span> -e .</pre>
</div>
<h2>3.下载模型</h2>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>pip <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">install</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> modelscope
modelscope download </span>--model IndexTeam/IndexTTS-<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1.5</span></pre>
</div>
<p>下载模型完成后，默认在用户目录，比如：C:\Users\xiao\.cache\modelscope\hub\IndexTeam/IndexTTS-1.5</p>
<p>将里面的文件，全部复制到github项目文件夹 index-tts\checkpoints里面。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202508/1341090-20250815181251827-960972188.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;运行web demo</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>python webui.py</pre>
</div>
